job_history.work_description: Managed team of 100 professionals. Oversees accounting and financial activities. Managed all general ledger activity, reporting systems, GAAP standards. Monitored timely and accurate monthly, quarterly and year-end closing process. Prepared company forecasts and budget. Coordinated, monitored, and supported taxation requirements in compliance with and knowledge of governmental regulations and requirements. Managed and tracked the revenue of invested assets to ensure compliance with company policies and investment guidelines.

Manage the 32-person Corporate Practice Group which specializes in the taxation and tax planning for corporations and sole proprietorships. Wrote comprehensive practice manual for payroll taxation practice. Analyzes financial statements of major corporations, large domestic and investment companies and broker/dealers to evaluate credit quality for commercial lending decisions. Prepare Credit Approval Summaries on client's financial position in light of current economic conditions and future business outlook.

Improved collections through the development of receivables performance measurement system to which project supervisor are held accountable. Upgraded the accounting department including personnel, job descriptions and financial controls to meet the requirements of a growing organization. Assisted external auditors in performing year-end audits. Monitored, reviewed and evaluated budget projections, grants / budget vs. actual day-to-day expenses, and provided advice on budgetary opportunities to address anticipated / projected shortfalls on an ongoing basis.

Established line of credit used in financing working capital requirements. Implemented departmental budget vs. actual reporting system. Consolidated branch accounting operations resulting in staff reduction. Improved P.C.-based general ledger and Account Payable software to improve reporting. Submitted monthly financial statements to Board of Director (BOD). Supervised four (4) direct and fifteen (15) indirect reports.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing financial activities, including accounting, budgeting, and forecasting, across multiple roles, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has led teams of up to 100 professionals, demonstrating strong leadership skills and the ability to manage and motivate large teams.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing general ledger activity, reporting systems, and GAAP standards, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Has prepared company forecasts and budgets, and monitored budget projections, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has analyzed financial statements of major corporations to evaluate credit quality, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Taxation
skills.explanation: Has coordinated, monitored, and supported taxation requirements, and written comprehensive practice manuals for payroll taxation practice, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Planning
skills.explanation: Has prepared company forecasts and budgets, and monitored budget projections, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Auditing
skills.explanation: Has assisted external auditors in performing year-end audits, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Has submitted monthly financial statements to the Board of Directors, and implemented departmental budget vs. actual reporting systems, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for managing financial records and reports, suggesting strong proficiency.
